nodes.text: During the Iron Blockade, which was established by the Empire in an attempt to prevent news of their crushing defeat by the Alliance to Restore the Republic at the Battle of Endor from reaching the Anoat sector's populace, an unidentified individual on Allyuen sent out a distress signal on one of the less used communication frequencies, requesting medical aid and extraction.
In response, the Smuggler dispatched one of their crew members to render assistance to the individual.
